body: Hello, I can't run your file on my laptop but I put an example together which shows the logic. You need to use solveAdj separately couple of times . [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HMrNkLH2ZKPiuZyoPP8XJUmq6vY*tCy8I7DaqcyfYJBze6L7xsDxYy2kd4nbMpr7uN-NYEH5L4BnXk5qg97MfhUkfoQE01KV/modify_idf_file.png) PS: Also tapering the end of DSF zones will save you one extra intersection.
